column2: s Speech at Harvard Law School-Truth!

column1: Charleton Heston is said to have given a speech at the Harvard Law School which, at the time, was regarded as a boring presentation by a Conservative in a mostly liberal environment.  Rush Limbaugh liked the speech, however, and read it on the air.  After that, the number of requests for the speech turned it into a popular item.
The story is true and the speech, for the most part, is as he delivered it.
The speech has been published on the Harvard website.
A real example of the eRumor as it has appeared on the Internet:
